topic.title: XDCR REST API
topic.shortdesc: Cross Datacenter Replication (XDCR) enables you to automatically replicate data between clusters and between data buckets.

body.p: When you use XDCR, you specify source and destination clusters. A source cluster is the cluster from which you want to copy data. A destination cluster is the cluster where you want the replica data to be stored. When you configure replication, you specify your selections for an individual cluster using Couchbase Admin Console. XDCR replicates data between specific buckets and specific clusters and you can configure replication be either uni-directional or bi-directional. Uni-directional replication means that XDCR replicates from a source to a destination; in contrast, bi-directional replication means that XDCR replicates from a source to a destination and also replicates from the destination to the source.
